message_1: Find the dimension of the vector space of holomorphic 2-forms on a compact Calabi-Yau 3-fold, given that the Hodge numbers h^{1,1} and h^{2,1} are 101 and 303, respectively.
message_2:
In a compact Calabi-Yau 3-fold, the Hodge diamond is symmetric, and the Hodge numbers h^{p,q} are equal to h^{3-p,3-q}. The dimension of the vector space of holomorphic 2-forms is given by the Hodge number h^{2,0}.

Since h^{2,1} = 303, we have h^{1,2} = 303 as well. Now, we can use the symmetry of the Hodge diamond to find h^{2,0}:

h^{2,0} = h^{1,1} = 101

Thus, the dimension of the vector space of holomorphic 2-forms on this compact Calabi-Yau 3-fold is 101.
